root.texto: Hey #Georgia Who are the Democratic Candidates in your District? THREAD of All Democratic Candidates with their Photos & Websites VOTE MAY 22, 2018 Register by April 24: https://t.co/iITprRX12r #GA01 #GA02 #GA03 #GA04 #GA05 #GA06 #GA07 #GA08 #GA09 #GA10 #GA11 #GA12 #GA13 #GA14 https://t.co/DJNxswYDgU VOTER REGISTRATION GEORGIA PRIMARIES MAY 22, 2018 Register Online by April 24 here: https://t.co/iITprRX12r Find Voting Location here: https://t.co/wm8B1c2QbD #GA01 #GA02 #GA03 #GA04 #GA05 #GA06 #GA07 #GA08 #GA09 #GA10 #GA11 #GA12 #GA13 #GA14 https://t.co/AvjZBDgU2r Democratic Candidates for #GA01 #GA1 Primary Election MAY 22, 2018 Register by April 24, 2018 Lisa Ring. Bryan County Democratic Chair & Ex-Corrections Officer https://t.co/MGt5AVXhbn @LisaRingGA01 Barbara Seidman, Retiree https://t.co/KgeVqvAM3H vs GOP Buddy Carter https://t.co/58Ta418dta Democratic Candidates for #GA02 #GA2 VOTE November 6, 2018! Democratic Incumbent Sanford Bishop https://t.co/JQrpd9mCbO Watch clips of him from C-Span here: https://t.co/HA1nR2Do8C https://t.co/JbmFCTrlHI Democratic Candidates for #GA03 #GA3 VOTE May 22, 2018 REGISTER by April 24 Chuck Enderlin, Airline Pilot & USMC Veteran https://t.co/kRdx65qVFf @Vote_Chuck Rusty Oliver, Teacher https://t.co/q5MOUBN53P @OliverForGA3rd vs GOP Drew Ferguson https://t.co/UT6gnkKHso Democratic Candidates for #GA04 #GA4 VOTE May 22, 2018 REGISTER by April 24 Hank Johnson https://t.co/GAmvOanrXY @ReElectHank https://t.co/FbTOAP9GFw Juan Parks, Marine JROTC Instructor & Afghan War Veteran https://t.co/rx1dFbSUrN @JuanParks4Ga https://t.co/qKxcU4Mns3 Democratic Candidate for #GA05 #GA5 VOTE November 6, 2018! #Midterms2018 in Georgia! #BlueWaveGA John Lewis https://t.co/S0cuConvoA @repjohnlewis See clips of him on C-span here: https://t.co/NSjQx9DV9b https://t.co/v57Mrlaz29 Democratic Candidates for #GA06 #GA6 VOTE May 22, 2018 #Midterms2018 #BlueWaveGA Kevin Abel https://t.co/V1eX6Di8wC @kabelvoice Steven Griffin https://t.co/U8l1VAgDp2 @SKnightGriffin Bobby Kaple https://t.co/nDjikDy7Pm @BobbyKaple Lucy McBath https://t.co/hJR4myVuHO @LucyWins2018 https://t.co/54UZ2R1rpo Democratic Candidates #GA07 #GA7 VOTE MAY 22, 2018 Kathleen Allen https://t.co/vHEBXrPoW7 Carolyn Bourdeaux https://t.co/M3OAAbEbg8 Melissa Davis https://t.co/Oo8Ia0yMlv David Kim https://t.co/BjvCync5UK Ethan Pham https://t.co/u45P9pk4zO Steve Reilly https://t.co/OeUD0oezkM https://t.co/2ZX0WHkJuo Democratic Candidates #GA08 #GA8 VOTE MAY 22, 2018 Early Voting: Apr 30, 2018 - May 21, 2018 vs GOP Incumbent Austin Scott **No Democratic Candidates Jimmy Cooper (Green) - Progressive Activist https://t.co/WivA1rEWdx https://t.co/SQzHiaYdFP Democratic Candidates #GA09 #GA9 VOTE MAY 22, 2018 Dave Cooper, Freelance Journalist, Retired Army Soldier & Iraq War Veteran https://t.co/VXlsp66G0n @DC4CongressGA Josh McCall, Teacher https://t.co/i61Zv1f9Ba @Mccallforall vs GOP Doug Collins https://t.co/Hqw2B6pizs Democratic Candidates #GA10 VOTE MAY 22, 2018 Register to VOTE by Apr 24 Chalis Montgomery, Educational Consultant & Minister https://t.co/vvNGhuBhbY @Montgomery4Cong Richard Winfield, College Professor & Author https://t.co/JgNiPMLVrw @WinfieldForUS vs GOP Jody Hice https://t.co/WJthNmTpl3 Democratic Candidates #GA11 VOTE MAY 22, 2018 Register to VOTE by Apr 24 Flynn Broady Jr Attorney, Retired Army Soldier & Iraq War Veteran https://t.co/AWkF7CXwRm @flynndbroadyjr vs GOP Barry Loudermilk https://t.co/ErpFEGG1aI Democratic Candidates #GA12 VOTE MAY 22, 2018 Francys Johnson, Ex-State NAACP President, Attorney & Minister https://t.co/hNsl1icODZ @francysjohnson Trent Nesmith, Roofing Company Owner & Non-Profit Group Founder https://t.co/eu7zdSI6jC @VoteTrent18 vs GOP Rick Allen https://t.co/3Alme20zGI Democratic Incumbent Candidate #GA13 David Scott https://t.co/LfWnlzDD7Y @Electdavidscott https://t.co/WRZ8AdwB4M https://t.co/7nMt4vbYzd Democratic Incumbent Candidate #GA14 Steven Foster, Physician & Businessman https://t.co/rLtz1XMhXg https://t.co/K6NLbN8akj vs GOP Incumbent Tom Graves https://t.co/U5w7PGW7LM Democratic Candidates for Governor in Georgia #Midterms2018 Stacey Abrams, Ex-State House Minority Leader & Attorney https://t.co/g5NFKlKWkw @staceyabrams Stacey Evans, Ex-State Rep. & Attorney https://t.co/TCDwQBrvHY @EvansforGeorgia Gov. Nathan Deal, is Term-Limited in 2018 https://t.co/xN6wgJjIJL Democratic Candidates for Lt. Gov. in Georgia Sarah Riggs Amico, Businesswoman https://t.co/PmYf9tTpwU @SarahRiggsAmico Triana Arnold James, Pastor, Businesswoman & Army Veteran https://t.co/6LgaXpJ5Co @triana4georgia vs GOP Incumbent Casey Cagle https://t.co/E73qeBKbdy Democratic Candidates for Secretary of State in Georgia John Barrow https://t.co/gID0o7pJLX @Barrow4Georgia Dee Dawkins-Haigler https://t.co/mJV2q1ieUW @DDawkinsHaigler R.J. Hadley https://t.co/XsviCqYhQB @rjfromrockdale GOP SoS Brian Kemp is a Candidate for Governor in 2018 https://t.co/60fd7aP1GJ Democratic Candidates for Attorney General of Georgia #GA01 #GA02 #GA03 #GA04 #GA05 #GA06 #GA07 #GA08 #GA09 #GA10 #GA11 #GA12 #GA13 #GA14 Charlie Bailey, Attorney & Ex-Lt Gov Aide https://t.co/tk4ccsYYNd @charlie4georgia vs GOP Incumbent Chris Carr https://t.co/daPmiHcawN Voter ID Rules for Georgia PRIMARIES MAY 22, 2018 Register to Vote by April 24th. Mail-in form here: https://t.co/iITprRX12r Mail to Country Registrar. Addresses here: https://t.co/MgtWE4yKKv #GA01 #GA02 #GA03 #GA04 #GA05 #GA06 #GA07 #GA08 #GA09 #GA10 #GA11 #GA12 #GA13 #GA14 https://t.co/TnC3QqolDg ABSENTEE BALLOT GEORGIA PRIMARIES MAY 22, 2018 Register by April 24: https://t.co/iITprRX12r Request Absentee Ballot by May 18 Return Absentee Ballot by May 22 Apply with this Form: https://t.co/uLvSVfkDbt Mail to Country Registrar. Addresses here: https://t.co/MgtWE4yKKv https://t.co/kE9ENnMySi EARLY VOTING Georgia You get to vote in your Primary Election MAY 22, 2018 in GEORGIA! Early Voting: Apr 30, 2018 - May 21, 2018 Find Early/Advance Voting info (by County) including Dates & Locations here: https://t.co/wm8B1c2QbD https://t.co/pgEXmWb55Q
